## CommonVersionsConfiguration.getAllPreferredVersions() method

Returns the union of preferredVersions and xstitchPreferredVersions.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
getAllPreferredVersions(): Map<string, string>;
```
<b>Returns:</b>

Map&lt;string, string&gt;
